content: For the full year of 2022, we expect invoice premium at December 31 of between $610 million and $615 million; gross earned premium between $476 million and $480 million; revenue between $236 million and $239 million; adjusted EBITDA loss between $245 million and $240 million; and we expect stock-based compensation expense of approximately $60 million, capital expenditures of approximately $10 million and a share count weighted again for the additional shares issued in connection with the Metromile acquisition, totaling approximately 70 million shares for the fourth quarter.
